p: Other medicinal uses of Euphorbia species have been described in the categories of social uses, environmental uses, neoplasms, ornamentals uses, fuelwood, timber products, and wood crafts, hedge/fence [ 14, 21]. Other miscellaneous uses include the treatment of rheumatism conditions, as nutrients in food, as blood purifiers for paralysis and hallucination disorders [ 14]. The most utilized species in these categories are E. ingens, E. antiquorum, E. fischeriana, E. esula, E. lathyris, E.serpens, E. nivulia, and E. peplus [ 14, 23].
